channel.title: Need server help!
channel.description: Guys, I made a server and portforwarded & it worked. 12 Hour's earlier the server dc'ed now nobody can get on accept me :o

item.title: Need server help!
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

[quote=“run3scap3_uk, post:3, topic:423062”][quote author=lemme_winks_ link=topic=525716.msg3827771#msg3827771 date=1322331246]

Guys, I made a server and portforwarded & it worked. 12 Hour’s earlier the server dc’ed now nobody can get on accept me :o

you most likely never changed to a static ip address.
either change to a static address or port forward with your new address

http://portforward.com/networking/staticip.htm
[/quote]
People were on ealier though?[/quote]
take a look at this: http://whatismyipaddress.com/dynamic-static

Read full topic

[/quote]
you most likely never changed to a static ip address.
